title: HR Support Requests
content:
HR processes support allows an organization to integrate its HR operations as a part of Service Request Management, benefiting from familiar data structure, workflow, reports, and so on. HR Support Requests:

  • Can be configured and managed separately from IT service catalog request processes
  • Are designed to streamline processes that don't require approval or validation

Related topics

  • Service Request Management roles and permissions
  • Service Request Management procedures
  • Live Support
  • How to edit a form
  • Data domain segmentation
